<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### getPromotionCandidatesForInstruction() {#ad7143519efbd492ef7ced88c6198e1ca}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MutableArrayRef&lt; InstrProfValueData &gt; ICallPromotionAnalysis::getPromotionCandidatesForInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I, uint64&#95;t &amp; TotalCount, uint32&#95;t &amp; NumCandidates)</>}>
Returns reference to array of InstrProfValueData for the given instruction <code>I</code>.

The <code>TotalCount</code> and <code>NumCandidates</code> are set to the the total profile count of the indirect call <code>I</code> and the number of profitable candidates in the given array (which is sorted in reverse order of profitability).

The returned array space is owned by this class, and overwritten on subsequent calls.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/indirectcallpromotionanalysis-h/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/indirectcallpromotionanalysis-h">IndirectCallPromotionAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/indirectcallpromotionanalysis-cpp/#l00084">84</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/indirectcallpromotionanalysis-cpp">IndirectCallPromotionAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
